Globally Local - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Globally Local World Travellers is thrilled to be partnering with the TVNZ BREAKFAST SHOW as the Travel show partner for the remainder of 2025! Tune in each fortnight on Tuesday morning as our travel specialists join the Breakfast team live on the couch, sharing incredible travel experiences from around the globe. Designed to ignite a passion for exploration and broaden horizons, these highlights will showcase unforgettable destinations and unique adventures. View the latest TVNZ Breakfast clips here Episode 9: 29 October 2025 Featuring Mary Buckley from Shore Travel, sharing travel inspiration on Regent Seven Seas Cruises & Club Med . August Episdoe 1: 5 August 2025 Featuring Gordy Bayne from World Travellers, talking about Hawaiian Airlines , Hawaii & Seabourn . WATCH HERE Episode 2: 19 August 2025 Featuring Luisa Walsh from World Travellers Gisborne, talking about Wendy Wu Tours , Viking Cruises & Travelwise Holidays . WATCH HERE September Episode 3: 2 September 2025 Featuring Nicola McLaren from World Travellers New Plymouth, talking about Emirates , Back-Roads Touring & London . WATCH HERE Episode 4: 9 September 2025 Featuring Monica McGibbon from World Travellers Rolleston, talking about Fiji & Fiji Airways . WATCH HERE Episode 5: 16 September 2025 Featuring Gordy Bayne from World Travellers, talking about Globus Touring , Rome & Disney Cruise Line . WATCH HERE Episode 6: 30 September 2025 Featuring Neroli Sail from World Travellers, talking about Cunard , G Adventures , Seabourn & Japan with Wendy Wu . WATCH HERE October Episode 7: 14 October 2025 Featuring Gordy Bayne from World Travellers, talking about Viking , Oceania Cruises , Trafalgar & Trafalgar River Cruises .
